'''Exile's Pocket Watch''' is an [[Artifact]] in the set [[The Exile]].

==Description==
The aristocrat acquired this pocket watch back in his youth.<br>This delicate timepiece recorded every moment of his childhood.<br>But tragedy brought his carefree days to an abrupt end.<br>The aristocrat was forced into a long and lonesome exile.
